If you're interested in a samurai film with thrilling action and a memorable cast, "The Last Samurai" (2003) starring Tom Cruise and William Atherton is a thrilling and visually stunning movie.

If you're seeking a historical war film with a focus on redemption and human resilience, then "Cold Mountain" (2003) starring Melora Walters and James Gammon is an unforgettable and poignant movie.
